name: Model Bacterial Growth Dynamics
description: Model bacterial population dynamics over time using ordinary differential equations
run: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni /tmp/biomni && pip install -q -e /tmp/biomni && python /mnt/code/model_bacterial_growth_dynamics.py

fields.name: initial_population
fields.description: Initial bacterial population size (CFU/ml or cells)

fields.name: clearance_rate
fields.description: Rate at which bacteria are cleared from the system (per hour)

fields.name: niche_size
fields.description: Maximum carrying capacity of the environment (CFU/ml or cells)
